data.name: Abomasnow

abilities.name: Blessings of the Frost
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may attach a Grass Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hypno Hammer
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

data.name: Abomasnow

attacks.name: Soothing Scent
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: If it sees any packs of Darumaka going after Snover, it chases them off, swinging its sizable arms like hammers.

abilities.name: Snow Veil
abilities.text: As long as Abomasnow is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Snow Play
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon, excluding Grass Pokémon and Water Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Below Zero
attacks.text: If Abomasnow evolved from Snover during this turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Abomasnow

attacks.name: Bang Heads
attacks.text: Both this Pokémon and the Defending Pokémon are now Confused.

data.flavorText: They appear when the snow flowers bloom. When the petals fall, they retreat to places unknown again.

data.name: Abomasnow

abilities.name: Glacier Snow
abilities.text: If Abomasnow is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Abomasnow is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Heavy Blizzard
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. It is the abominable snowman.

data.name: Abomasnow

abilities.name: Blessings of the Frost
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may attach a Water Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hypno Hammer
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

data.name: Abomasnow

attacks.name: Ice Age
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Dragon Pokémon, it is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

data.name: Abomasnow

attacks.name: Quick Freeze
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has any Water Energy attached to it, it is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as "The Ice Monster."

data.name: Abomasnow

abilities.name: Toughness Boost
abilities.text: Your Single Strike Pokémon in play, except any Abomasnow, get +50 HP. You can't apply more than 1 Toughness Boost Ability at a time.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon is known to bring blizzards. A shake of its massive body is enough to cause whiteout conditions.

data.name: Abomasnow

abilities.name: Toughness Boost
abilities.text: Your Single Strike Pokémon in play, except any Abomasnow, get +50 HP. You can't apply more than 1 Toughness Boost Ability at a time.

data.flavorText: The Pokémon is known to bring blizzards. A shake of its massive body is enough to cause whiteout conditions.

data.name: Abomasnow

attacks.name: Double-Edge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: If it sees any packs of Darumaka going after Snover, it chases them off, swinging its sizable arms like hammers.

data.name: Abomasnow

abilities.name: Freezing Disaster
abilities.text: Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) can't be healed.

data.flavorText: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

abilities.text: Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) can't be healed.

data.flavorText: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

data.name: Abomasnow

attacks.name: Frozen Wood
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has 2 or more Grass Energy attached, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.flavorText: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

data.name: Mega Abomasnow ex
rules: Mega Evolution ex Rule: When your Mega Evolution Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hammer-lanche
attacks.text: Discard the top 6 cards of your deck, and this attack does 100 damage for each Basic Water Energy card that you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Frost Barrier
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
